video.title: InuYasha
video.synopsis: Yanked down a well, schoolgirl Kagome Higurashi emerges in feudal Japan, where she must reassemble a sacred jewel while eluding half-demon InuYasha.

episodes.synopsis: In feudal Japan, the half demon Inuyasha was sealed away by the priestess Kikyo. Years later he is revived by Kagome, who has slipped through time from the present day. Kagome is surprised when the sacred Shikon Jewel emerges from a cut on her body.
episodes.title: The Girl Who Overcame Time... and the Boy Who Was Just Overcome

episodes.synopsis: Kagome finds out that she may be the reincarnation of Kaede's late older sister, the priestess Kikyo, who sealed Inuyasha with her arrow. The Carrion Crow demon is after the Shikon Jewel and kidnaps Kagome, but Inuyasha shows up to save her.
episodes.title: Seekers of the Sacred Jewel

episodes.synopsis: Kagome has the ability to see pieces of the Shikon Jewel. Inuyasha has the ability to defeat demons. Both of their powers are needed to gather the shards of the jewel that were scattered, but the two don't get along.
episodes.title: Down the Rabbit Hole and Back Again

episodes.synopsis: Kagome has returned to the present day and is relaxing in her home when Inuyasha comes looking for her. Some of Yura's demonic hair is on his body. Kagome and Inuyasha return to feudal Japan to exterminate the Yura of the hair.
episodes.title: Yura of the Demon-Hair

episodes.synopsis: Kagome learns that Inuyasha is half demon, born of a human mother and a dog demon. Inuyasha's half brother Sesshomaru appears, looking for the tomb of their father. In order to manipulate Inuyasha, Sesshomaru brings Inuyasha's dead mother with him.
episodes.title: Aristocratic Assassin, Sesshomaru

episodes.synopsis: The muonna makes Inuyasha reveal the location of his father's grave. Sesshomaru removes Inuyasha's right eye (the black pearl) and opens the entrance to the grave. Kagome is angered by Sesshomaru's cruelty. She goes with Inuyasha after Sesshomaru.
episodes.title: Tetsusaiga, the Phantom Sword

episodes.synopsis: Kagome is able to pull out the Tetsusaiga. Sesshomaru tries to kill her, thus angering Inuyasha, who fights to protect Kagome. His will to protect a human changes the Tetsusaiga into its true form, a fang sword.
episodes.title: Showdown! Inuyasha vs. Sesshomaru

episodes.synopsis: In the Kai Province, there is a clumsy and earnest young samurai named Nobunaga. He has heard rumors about the man that the princess, his childhood friend, has married. Nobunaga tries to save the lord of the castle, who is possessed by a toad demon.
episodes.title: The Toad Who Would Be Prince

episodes.synopsis: Shippo is a demon fox whose father was killed by the Thunder Brothers, Hiten and Manten. He steals the Shikon Jewel shards from Kagome so that he can avenge his father.
episodes.title: Enter Shippo Plus, the Amazing Thunder Brothers!

episodes.synopsis: Shippo is a demon fox whose father was killed by the the Thunder Brothers, Hiten and Manten. Shippo steals the Shikon Jewel shards from Kagome so that he can avenge his father.
episodes.title: Phantom Showdown: The Thunder Brothers vs. Tetsusaiga

episodes.synopsis: Kagome has returned to the present day to take a test. As she does, a noh mask, the Mask of Flesh, begins a violent search for the Shikon Jewel shards. Kagome's younger brother, Sota, tries hard to call Inuyasha to come to Kagome's rescue.
episodes.title: The Terror of the Ancient Noh Mask

episodes.synopsis: Kagome sees a Soul Piper, a demon that consoles the spirits of children. She helps Mayu, a girl who is about to become an evil spirit, to pass on.
episodes.title: The Soul Piper and the Mischievous Little Soul

episodes.synopsis: Half-demon Inuyasha's secret is that he becomes human once a month. That day, Inuyasha and the gang meet Nazuna and stay at a mountain temple. They fall into Kumogashira's trap and the sacred jewel shards are taken away from them.
episodes.title: The Mystery of the New Moon and the Black-Haired Inuyasha

episodes.synopsis: The ogress Urasue robs the grave of Kikyo, the priestess who sealed away Inuyasha 50 years ago. She revives Kikyo's body using the ashes of Kikyo's bones and soil from Kikyo's grave. But Kikyo's soul has already been reincarnated in a different body.
episodes.title: Kikyo's Stolen Ashes

episodes.synopsis: Kikyo is revived when Kagome's soul flows into her. She tries to kill Inuyasha, but Kagome takes back her soul. Years ago, Kikyo wanted Inuyasha to use the Shikon Jewel to become human, but someone killed her before this could happen.
episodes.title: Return of the Tragic Priestess, Kikyo

episodes.synopsis: Miroku, a womanizing priest, has been collecting Shikon Jewel shards and steals Kagome's shards. Inuyasha tracks him down and confronts Miroku to get the shards back.
episodes.title: Mystical Hand of the Amorous Monk, Miroku

episodes.synopsis: Kotatsu, a painter, sees a dream in which he becomes successful by controlling an army of ogres drawn with ink that has a sacred jewel shard in it. Inuyasha and the others become involved in protecting the princess that Kotatsu is in love with.
episodes.title: The Cursed Ink of the Hell-Painter

episodes.synopsis: Naraku appears before Sesshomaru and lends him an arm with a sacred jewel shard embedded in it. Sesshomaru attaches the arm to himself and appears before Inuyasha and the gang to steal the Tetsusaiga.
episodes.title: Naraku and Sesshomaru Join Forces

episodes.synopsis: Sesshomaru wields the Tetsusaiga with his borrowed arm against Inuyasha, who fights back with his scabbard. When the two strike each other, Inuyasha gets up close to Sesshomaru. Also, when Inuyasha learns Naraku's plan, he fears for Kagome's life.
episodes.title: Go Home to Your Own Time, Kagome!

episodes.synopsis: Kagome has her sacred jewel shards taken away from her and is returned to the present day, unable to return to feudal Japan. Back to her normal life, she agrees to go on a date with Hojo.
episodes.title: Despicable Villain: The Mystery of Onigumo!

episodes.synopsis: Kagome returns to the shrine in the middle of her date with Hojo. She senses the presence of the Shikon Jewel shards and returns to feudal Japan. Naraku reveals that 50 years ago, Onigumo was in love with Kikyo.
episodes.title: Naraku's True Identity Unveiled

episodes.synopsis: Kikyo, who was brought back to life, is living as a priestess. A monk who realizes that Kikyo is dead tries to make her pass on, but Kikyo ends up killing him.
episodes.title: A Wicked Smile; Kikyo's Wandering Soul

episodes.synopsis: Kikyo paralyzes Kagome, and Inuyasha appears before her. Kikyo has been gathering the souls of dead girls. She vents her grudge against Inuyasha, who reveals that he has never forgotten her.
episodes.title: Kagome's Voice and Kikyo's Kiss

episodes.synopsis: Sango, a demon slayer, is invited to Hitomi Castle along with her father, the leader of the demon slayers, and her younger brother, Kohaku. But it is a trap. Meanwhile, the undefended village is attacked by a horde of demons.
episodes.title: Enter Sango, the Demon Slayer

episodes.synopsis: Sango fights Inuyasha, believing him to be her enemy. Naraku's plan is to have her fight to the death using the power of the Shikon Jewel shard. But Sango listens to Kagome and is no longer suspicious of Inuyasha.
episodes.title: Naraku's Insidious Plot

episodes.synopsis: Sango reveals the secret story of the Shikon Jewel's birth. Midoriko, a priestess with powerful spiritual powers, fused with many demons after a battle to the death. She absorbed the souls of the demons into her own, punched out her soul and died.
episodes.title: Secret of the Jewel of Four Souls Revealed

episodes.synopsis: Inuyasha and the gang meet Taromaru, the son of a village leader. They go to the Temple of the Water God, where children are being sacrificed. The Water God has a sacred treasure and toys around with the group.
episodes.title: The Lake of the Evil Water God

episodes.synopsis: A demon injures Miroku's wind tunnel. Miroku visits the temple of Mushin, the man who raised him, for help treating the injury. Mushin is possessed by an Urn Grub and attacks Miroku. Furthermore, Miroku is paralyzed and is surrounded by many demons.
episodes.title: Miroku Falls into a Dangerous Trap

episodes.synopsis: Sango's younger brother, Kohaku, who's supposed to be dead, is alive. Naraku reveals that Kohaku is living because of a sacred jewel shard that is planted in his back.
episodes.title: Sango's Suffering and Kohaku's Life

episodes.synopsis: Sango steals the Tetsusaiga and is led to Naraku's castle. Sango tries to use the opportunity to kill Naraku, but she is seriously injured by an attack from Kohaku. Inuyasha and the gang catch up to her, but they are in danger from Naraku's miasma.
episodes.title: Tetsusaiga Is Stolen! Showdown at Naraku's Castle!

episodes.synopsis: Kirara has been weakened by Naraku's poison. Inuyasha and Kagome go looking for an herbal antidote. Jinenji, a demon who is protecting an herb field, is actually a half demon and is picked on by the villagers because of his weakness.
episodes.title: Jinenji, Kind Yet Sad

episodes.synopsis: Inuyasha and Miroku come across a cave when they go looking for the source of a strong evil presence. The Fuko-no-Jutsu has been placed on the cave. Hundreds of demons will fight to the death and are absorbed by the victors.
episodes.title: Kikyo and Inuyasha, Into the Miasma

episodes.synopsis: Inuyasha and the gang go to save Kikyo. They are struck with Death by Illusion, a demon technique. Kagome is not affected by the technique, so Kikyo takes away her Shikon Jewel shards and tries to kill her.
episodes.title: Kikyo, Captured by Naraku

episodes.synopsis: The Tenseiga and the Tetsusaiga, two great swords that were forged by swordsmith Totosai, have been left to Sesshomaru and Inuyasha by their father. Sesshomaru wants a sword to fight with and is unsatisfied with the Tenseiga, a healing sword.
episodes.title: Tetsusaiga and Tenseiga

episodes.synopsis: Inuyasha's eye is closed by poison from Sesshomaru's claws. He relies on the smell of demon energies clashing to find the wind scar. He releases his sword's true power and forces Sesshomaru to withdraw. Totosai accepts Inuyasha as Tetsusaiga's owner.
episodes.title: The True Owner of the Great Sword!

episodes.synopsis: Koga is the young leader of the demon wolf tribe, whose wolf minions were killed by Inuyasha. He places Shikon Jewel shards in his arms and legs, which he uses as weapons, making him an even match with Inuyasha -- but it's Kagome who intrigues him.
episodes.title: Kagome Kidnapped by Koga, the Wolf Demon!

episodes.synopsis: Koga and the demon wolf tribe begin their attack on the Birds of Paradise. Kagome senses that the sacred jewel shard is in the mouth of the brothers who lead the Birds of Paradise and tells Koga. Koga and the brothers fight for each other's shards.
episodes.title: The Man Who Fell in Love with Kagome!

episodes.synopsis: Kagome is angry that Inuyasha is suspicious of her relationship with Koga and returns to the present day. She goes back to school for the first time in a while, where she has to deal with the advances of yet another suitor.
episodes.title: Two Hearts, One Mind

episodes.synopsis: Kagura, a wind demon, used rumors of Shikon Jewel shards to draw out demon wolf tribe members and kill them. She lures Inuyasha and the gang out and attacks them with the corpses of the demon wolf tribe members.
episodes.title: Trapped in a Duel to the Death!

episodes.synopsis: At the end of a desperate struggle, Koga corners Inuyasha, but he is extremely weakened by the poisonous shard in his arm. Kagura appears and controls the wind in the battlefield. Inuyasha stands up, but she tosses him about.
episodes.title: The Deadly Trap of Kagura the Wind Sorceress!

episodes.synopsis: Miroku is reunited with Koharu, leaving her in a village where Kanna, the older sister of Kagura, appears. Kanna steals Koharu's soul with a soul-sucking mirror, and Koharu is manipulated along with the villagers into attacking InuYasha.
episodes.title: Kagura's Dance and Kanna's Mirror

episodes.synopsis: Kanna's mirror fails to absorb Kagome's soul, probably because of its size, but it reflects Inuyasha's Wind Scar, the Tetsusaiga's special technique. Inuyasha is injured by the wind blasted back at him -- then Naraku appears.
episodes.title: The Wind Scar Fails

episodes.synopsis: Kikyo gave the sacred jewel shards she had stolen from Kagome to Naraku. She appears before Inuyasha and tells him not to kill her until she is wiped out along with the Shikon Jewel and Naraku.
episodes.title: Tetsusaiga Breaks

episodes.synopsis: Totosai repairs the Tetsusaiga using one of Inuyasha's fangs. Meanwhile, Sessomaru takes the fangs of the deceased Goshinki to smith Kaijinbo. He brings the fangs back to life with the Tenseiga.
episodes.title: Kaijinbo's Evil Sword

episodes.synopsis: Kaijinbo the swordsmith, manipulated by the sword Tokijin, charges at Inuyasha. In the end, Kaijinbo is wiped out by the force of the Tetsusaiga. All that is left is the Tokijin, which is untouchable because of the evil energy it emits.
episodes.title: Sesshomaru Wields Tokijin

episodes.synopsis: Naraku's new minions, Juromaru and Kageromaru, attack Inuyasha and the gang. Koga comes to save Kagome from danger. He fights the two demons as he bickers with Inuyasha, but he struggles against Kageromaru, who digs underground.
episodes.title: Juromaru and Kageromaru

episodes.synopsis: Because of the incident with Koga, Kagome has a fight with Inuyasha and goes back to the present day. Meanwhile, Naraku wants to get rid of Onigumo's feelings for Kikyo by sending a giant Shinidamachu to kill Kikyo.
episodes.title: Onigumo's Heart Still Beats Within Naraku

episodes.synopsis: Kagome returns to the present day. She senses that Inuyasha has chosen Kikyo and wonders if she can ever go back to the past, but she still has the Shikon Jewel shards. She decides to give them back and put everything to an end.
episodes.title: Return to the Place Where We First Met

episodes.synopsis: Sango finds the bodies of her father and the other slayers at the ruins of Naraku's castle. Her brother, Kohaku, is nearby but can only remember that he escaped the castle.
episodes.title: Kohaku's Lost Memory

episodes.synopsis: Sango's brother, Kohaku, is being manipulated by Naraku and is after Kagome's life. Inuyasha and the gang have been separated from Kagome, but Kohaku doesn't take Kagome's life.
episodes.title: That Unforgettable Face!

episodes.synopsis: Just as Inuyasha and the gang overcome Naraku's trap, Sesshomaru, who is investigating the secrets of Inuyasha's transformation, is visiting Bokusenno, a demon tree whose wood was used to make the sheaths for the Tetsusaiga and the Tenseiga.
episodes.title: Inuyasha's Soul, Devoured

episodes.synopsis: Inuyasha transforms into a demon when his life is in danger. He quickly destorys Gatenmaru, who has become a giant moth. He attacks the escaping bandits with his claws, and he cannot hear Kagome trying to stop him.
episodes.title: The Demon's True Nature

episodes.synopsis: Inuyasha visits Totosai's workplace by himself. The Tetsusaiga was broken by Goshinki, and Inuyasha's own fang was used to repair it. Inuyasha's fang isn't compatible with that of his great demon father, so the Tetsusaiga has become heavier.
episodes.title: Father's Old Enemy: Ryukotsusei

episodes.synopsis: Ryukotsusei knocks away the Tetsusaiga, and Inuyasha transforms into a demon. Totosai tells everyone to retreat because they are in danger, but Kagome decides to stay behind.
episodes.title: The Backlash Wave: Tetsusaiga's Ultimate Technique
